login.webManagementAuth: Leave username empty and use web management password

device.selectDeviceTips: Please select the devices you want to operate
device.noDeviceTip: You haven't added any devices yet.
device.addDeviceTip: Please run the following script in device shell to connect to the cloud
device.commandResponseLoadingTips: The configuration is being sent out. Please wait for a moment...

rtty.executeCommandR: Please execute command "rtty -R" in current terminal!
rtty.executeCommandS: Please execute command "rtty -S file" in current terminal!
rtty.clipboardInstructions: To enable clipboard permissions, click the site information icon on the left of address bar to access permission settings, or configure clipboard permissions for this site in browser privacy settings. You can also use Shift+Insert keyboard shortcut to paste.
rtty.fileTooLargeTips: The file you will upload is too large(> 4294967295 Byte)

errorPage.notLogion: You do not have permission to access this page. Please log in and try again.
errorPage.noPermission: You are not authorized to access this page.
errorPage.notFound:
This page seems to be missing.
Don't worry. Our team is already working on it and will fix it soon!

errorCode.SEND_EMAIL_OR_PHONE_FAILED: Please re-login to confirm the user identity.
errorCode.REQUEST_BUSY_ERROR: Too many requests. Try again later!
errorCode.DATA_USER_NOT_MATCH: The current data does not match the logged-in user.
errorCode.DATA_XSS_CHECK_FAILED: The request contains XSS attack elements, Please check
errorCode.USER_PHONE_EXPIRED: The mobile verification code has expired.
errorCode.USER_PHONE_CODE_ERROR: The mobile verification code is incorrect.
errorCode.VERIFICATION_CODE_COUNT_ERROR: Verification code error count exceeds limit
errorCode.REPEAT_REQUEST_VERIFICATION_CODE: You have already requested a verification code, please do not send again.
errorCode.USER_DATA_TO_BE_MODIFIED_NOT_EXIST: The data to be modified does not exist. Please check!
errorCode.USER_OBJECT_INFO_EMPTY: The object information cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_ID_NOT_NULL: The primary key ID should be null.
errorCode.USER_SEND_MODE_EMPTY: The sendMode(email/msg/site messages) cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_RECIPIENT_ID_EMPTY: The recipient ID cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_ID_EMPTY: The primary key ID cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_UPDATE_EMAIL_EMPTY: The email address cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_UPDATE_USER_TOKEN_EMPTY: The user token cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_USER_ID_EMPTY: The user ID cannot be empty!
errorCode.USER_PASSWORD_RESET_LINK_EXPIRED: The password reset link you clicked has expired. Please request a new password reset link by visiting the login page.
errorCode.ACCOUNT_CANCELLATION_LINK_EXPIRED: This link has expired. Please request account deletion again.
errorCode.CLOUD_EMAIL_NOT_MATCH_USER: The email not match the user.
